[h: id = arg(0)] [h: healerId = arg(1)] [h, if( argCount()>2): magicalAid = arg(2); magicalAid = 0] [h, if( argCount()>3): medSkill = arg(3); medSkill = "Chirurgy"] [h, if( argCount()>4): woundsToHeal = arg(4); woundsToHeal = "light,medium,heavy,incap" ] [h, if(healerId==""), code: { [h: medBonus = 0] };{ [h: skills = getProperty("skills", healerId)] [h: medBonus = json.get(skills, medSkill)] }] [h: sta = json.get(getProperty("attributes", id), "sta")] [h: boni = json.set("", "STA", sta)] [h, if(healerId!=""):boni=json.set(boni, getName(healerId)+"'s "+medSkill, medBonus)] [h, if(magicalAid!=0): boni=json.set(boni, "magical aid", magicalAid)] [h: db = json.set("", "light", json.set("", "stable", 4, "improvement", 10), "medium", json.set("", "stable", 6, "improvement", 12), "heavy", json.set("", "stable", 9, "improvement", 15), "incap", json.set("", "stable", 1, "improvement", 9) )] [h: wounds = getProperty("wounds",id)] [h: newWounds = json.set("", "light", if(listFind(woundsToHeal,"light")!=-1,0,json.get(wounds,"light")), "medium", if(listFind(woundsToHeal,"medium")!=-1,0,json.get(wounds,"medium")), "heavy", if(listFind(woundsToHeal,"heavy")!=-1,0,json.get(wounds,"heavy")), "incap", if(listFind(woundsToHeal,"incap")!=-1,0,json.get(wounds,"incap")), "dead", json.get(wounds,"dead")),id)] [r, foreach( wt, woundsToHeal, "
"), code: { [h: tnStab = json.get(json.get(db, wt), "stable")] [h: tnImpr = json.get(json.get(db, wt), "improvement")] [h: woundCount = json.get(getProperty("wounds", id),wt)] [r, if(woundCount>0): strformat("healing %{wt} wounds (stable %{tnStab}/improve %{tnImpr}): ");strformat("no %{wt} wounds.")] [r, count(woundCount),code: { [h: total = am5.jsonTotal(json.set("", "id", id, "boni", boni, "simple", 0, "ignoreWounds", 1))] [h: impSign="↑"] [h: worseSign="↓"] [h: stabSign="•"] [r: am5.ttRoll(total)][h: result = am5.total(total)][r, if( result >= tnImpr ): impSign][r, if( result < tnImpr && result >= tnStab): stabSign][r, if( result < tnStab): worseSign] [h, if( result >= tnImpr && wt == "medium"): newWounds=json.set(newWounds, "light", json.get(newWounds,"light")+1) ] [h, if( result >= tnImpr && wt == "heavy"): newWounds=json.set(newWounds, "medium", json.get(newWounds,"medium")+1) ] [h, if( result >= tnImpr && wt == "incap"): newWounds=json.set(newWounds, "heavy", json.get(newWounds,"heavy")+1) ] [h, if(result < tnImpr && result >= tnStab): newWounds=json.set(newWounds, wt, json.get(newWounds,wt)+1) ] [h, if( result < tnStab && wt == "light"): newWounds=json.set(newWounds, "medium", json.get(newWounds,"medium")+1) ] [h, if( result < tnStab && wt == "medium"): newWounds=json.set(newWounds, "heavy", json.get(newWounds,"heavy")+1) ] [h, if( result < tnStab && wt == "heavy"): newWounds=json.set(newWounds, "incap", json.get(newWounds,"incap")+1) ] [h, if( result < tnStab && wt == "incap"): newWounds=json.set(newWounds, "dead", json.get(newWounds,"dead")+1) ] }] }] [h: setProperty("wounds", newWounds, id)] [h: am5.setWoundStates(id)]

[h: status = input( "tab0|Settings||TAB", json.toList(settingsJson, "##"), "tab1|House Rules| |TAB", json.toList(hrJson, "##") )] [h: abort(status)] [h: setLibProperty("hrUseFaint", useFaint, "Lib:AM5")] [h: setLibProperty("limitTargets", limitTargets, "Lib:AM5")] [h: setLibProperty("manualDiceRoll", manualDiceRoll, "Lib:AM5")]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: assert(isGM(), "GM only!")] [h: id = currentToken()] [h: setPropertyType("Am5", id)] [h: msg = "This will delete all values in that token!
Are you sure?"] [h: status = input("dummy|"+msg+"||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE")] [h: abort(status)] [h: skills = ""] [h, foreach( s, getLibProperty("skillList", "Lib:AM5")): skills = json.set(skills,s, 0)] [h: knownWeaps = json.fields(getLibProperty("weaponTable", "Lib:AM5"))] [h: setProperty("attributes", json.set("", "qui", 0, "dex", 0, "str", 0, "sta", 0, "int", 0, "per", 0, "pre",0, "com",0), id)] [h:setProperty("skills", skills, id)] [h: setProperty("xtraLoad", 0, id)] [h: setProperty("soak", 0, id)] [h: setProperty("fatigue", 0, id)] [h: setProperty("woundRange", 5, id)] [h: setProperty("weaponAtt","Fist", id)] [h: setProperty("weaponDef","Dodge", id)] [h: setProperty("weapons", "Dodge, Fist, Kick", id)] [h: setProperty("armor", "None", id)] [h: setProperty("attSpec", 0, id)] [h: setProperty("defSpec", 0, id)] [h: setProperty("wounds", json.set("", "light", 0, "medium", 0, "heavy", 0, "incap", 0, "dead", 0),id)] [h:am5.setWoundStates(id)] [h, macro("EDIT@CAMPAIGN"): ""]

[h: status = input("name||Name")] [h: abort(status)]
[h: idx = 0] [h, foreach(id, getSelected()), code: { [h: idx=idx+1] [h: setName(strformat("%s %d", name, idx), id)] }]
